content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[ext_FACT_HGPLUM] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'FACT_HGPLUM/Archive',
        DATA_SOURCE = [eds_dw-halfen-2-dwh],
        FILE_FORMAT = [eff_Csv]  
) AS
SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://stxxxxslspeuw001.dfs.core.windows.net/dw-halfen-2-dwh-prod/FACT_HGPLUM/FACT_HGPLUM.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', parser_version = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR =',',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )
